events.message: The applicant has successfully submitted the mortgage loan application for their new house purchase.
The loan application was reviewed and categorized under Mortgage Loan based on the property purchase details.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to the applicant to guide them through the mortgage process.
The initial review of the mortgage application was conducted, verifying property details and applicant eligibility.
Additional documents including proof of income and property valuation were requested from the applicant.
The applicant submitted all requested documents, including bank statements and property appraisal reports.
Credit bureau reports were retrieved, and the applicantâ€™s credit score was confirmed to be within accepted limits.
Risk evaluation was completed considering the applicant's financial stability and property risk factors.
A mortgage loan offer including interest rate and repayment terms was presented to the applicant for review.
The applicant reviewed the offer and provided positive feedback, requesting a few clarifications on terms.
The application was escalated to the underwriting team to address applicant queries in detail.
After thorough review, the mortgage loan has been approved with terms agreed upon by both parties.
The approved mortgage loan amount was disbursed to the seller as per the closing schedule.
Follow-up communication was conducted to ensure the applicant understood the repayment schedule and next steps.
The mortgage loan application process has been successfully closed after funding and final follow-up.
